channel.title: Futurescape [317 - Allstar]
channel.description:
[b]Welcome.[/b]
After many years of hosting this server (about 2-3 years), I have decided to release it. I realize that it is a very old server type, and if you decide to flame because of that, I could care less.
[u]A few notes before we begin:[/u] ~ I do advise that you use the restarter in the folder and have it restart atleast every 60 mins, if not more. ~ The automatic save for when the server is turned off... i'm not sure if it works with windows 7 / vista / 64-bit computers, so be warned.
Now, let's get on with it.
[b]What the server has to offer:[/b]
~ Skill levels go to 175, max combat level is 223 ~ Lamps that will increase a stat to the max level ~ Double XP with accurate timer ( will explain how to change later ) ~ Accurate server restarter timer ( will explain how to change later ) ~ Lottery ~ Staff cannot trade, drop or lose items on death, so there's virtually no way to have items leaked by staff (for me, anyway) ~ 1 ip per connection ( I used a program to stop flooders , pm if you would like to get it ) ~ XP lock/unlock ~ Pk Point Rewards in quest tab, clickable ( will show in pics ) ~ Summoning shop for staff ~ Customizable yell for staff/anyone ~ Chat filter > yell has a filter, regular chat has a warn system according to a string of words, 5 warnings and they will automatically get banned < ~ Command logs ~ Automatic saving if the process for the server is closed ~ & so much more
[b]Pictures:[/b]
[b]Home[/b] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/aafvqf.jpg[/img]
[b]Train (teleports are according to combat level)[/b] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/29611ly.jpg[/img]
[b]Shops[/b] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/34ha0kh.jpg[/img]
[b]PkBox[/b] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/4imqeg.jpg[/img]
[b]Barrows (bit glitchy)[/b] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/20armts.jpg[/img]
[b]Skills[/b] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2ngri84.jpg[/img]
[b]Void mini[/b] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/1z1zr7k.jpg[/img]
[b]Abyss (every rift and RC altar works)[/b] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/256hji9.jpg[/img]
[b]Rares (anything from coins to phats,masks,lamps,scythes,etc)[/b] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/5vxj6q.jpg[/img]
[b]Lottery (costs 2147m, there are 0-23 scratches)[/b] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/w9zcbk.jpg[/img]
[b]Double XP (done via command, timer is set to an hour, will explain how to change)[/b] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2hmziv7.jpg[/img]
[b]Pk Points Exchange[/b] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2chrxon.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/28megxx.jpg[/img]
[u]How to change certain things:[/u] Double XP and server restarter timer;
For double xp: 1. Search "doubleXpTime = 7200;" in the client file 2. It's subtracted in milliseconds, therefore, if you want to have it for 45 minutes, simply do 120 x 45 = 5400. Basically times 120 by how many minutes.
For server restarter: 1. Search "restartTime = 5640;" in the server file 2. Same thing for the double xp timer, 120 x how many minutes.
[b]Credits:[/b] 95% to Mod Allstar. 5% to Me.
[b]And finally, the download link:[/b]
[url=http://uppit.com/c3xdqogza6ue/FS_Source.zip]http://uppit.com/c3xdqogza6ue/FS_Source.zip[/url]
I would advise for people to use the silab client.
On a final side note, I did not mention everything there is in the server.
Enjoy.
~ Ice
